name: Glory of Graves
description:
A military soldier who was trapped in an apocalyptic planet
takes off on a journey of blood and gore killing zombies and going on and on until he reaches the end ...

this is a Highly addictive 3d zombie shooter game which will blow your mind
with it's stunning Graphics and 3d music....

Features:
High quality Graphics 
3d sounds
Action packed 
Different zombies
Long Replayable levels
